pre_caption: The video begins with a medium shot, positioning a woman in the foreground on the left side of the frame. In the middle ground, a human tower is located in the center-right, surrounded by a crowd, with tall buildings forming the background. Initially, the camera is at the woman's level. As she turns her head to the right, the camera pans slightly right and then tilts sharply upward, following the vertical line of the human tower. This transition reframes the scene into a low-angle shot from below the tower, which now occupies the center of the frame from bottom to top.
